oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Top of Orchard Knob, Chickamauga Battlefield, Chattanooga
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of monuments and trees at the top of Orchard Knob in Chattanooga. Features a divided back, narrative, and handwritten correspondence on reverse. Note: most of the contents on the back of the postcard have surface damage.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials; Trees
